text: "B Boy Baby" is a song written by Phil Spector, Ellie Greenwich, Jeff Barry, Craig Klepto Tucker, Peter Celik and Angela Hunte. It features uncredited vocals by singer Amy Winehouse and was produced by Salaam Remi for Mutya Buena's debut album, Real Girl, being released as the fourth and final single from the album. ==Background== It borrows melodic and lyrical passages from "Be My Baby" by The Ronettes. The chorus to Buena's version is sung by British singer and songwriter Amy Winehouse. The single was a commercial failure for Mutya and her label, charting at number 73 on the UK Top 75. However, promotion for the single managed to get the album back into the UK Albums Chart, debuting at number 88 and peaking at number 83. "B Boy Baby" has since been used in various adverts on UK television. The single had a brief rebirth of minor success in America with a leaked remix featuring rappers Klepto and Complex. Record labels were never able to obtain distribution rights and the remixed single was only released on the artists personal mixtape titled Why U Mad Vol. 1 and later on YouTube.The Official UK Charts Company : TOP 100 ALBUMS CHART In 2008, the song surged in downloads and peaked at number one on the Greek's iTunes Top 10 Singles Chart. ==Music video== The video premiered on 4Music on 4 December 2007.YouTube - Mutya Buena - B Boy Baby - Ft Amy Winehouse It was filmed in Millennium Square, Bristol, and features "The Physical Jerks" – a group of break dancers. Amy Winehouse was supposed to appear in the video, however she was ultimately not featured in the video because of her personal struggles at the time. ==Track listing== * CD singlehttps://www.amazon.co.uk/B-Boy-Baby-Mutya- Buena/dp/B0010DJ1HE/ref=sr_1_1?s=music&ie;=UTF8&qid;=1343749577&sr;=1-1 # "B Boy Baby" (Radio Edit) – 3:02 # "Fast Car" (Radio 1 Live Lounge Session) – 3:12 # "B Boy Baby" (Video) – 3:05 * Digital download EPhttps://itunes.apple.com/gb/album/b-boy-baby-remixes- ep/id270017499https://itunes.apple.com/gb/album/b-boy-baby-radio-edit- single/id270742533 # "B Boy Baby" (Radio Edit) – 3:02 # "B Boy Baby" (Soul Seekerz Remix) – 5:36 # "B Boy Baby" (Music Kidz Remix) – 6:37 ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2007-2008) !Peak position |- |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (2008) !Position |- |Hungary (Rádiós Top 40) |align="center"|39 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2007 singles Category:Songs written by Ellie Greenwich Category:Songs written by Jeff Barry Category:Songs written by Phil Spector Category:Amy Winehouse songs Category:Mutya Buena songs Category:Year of song missing Category:4th & B'way Records singles
